import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" const Nav = () => { const [loggedIn, setLoggedIn] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { if (localStorage.getItem("token")) { setLoggedIn(true) } }, []) return (

) } export default Nav
